Enum MI

java.lang.Enum<MI>
com.github.oeuvres.alix.util.MI

Serializable, Comparable<MI>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum MI extends Enum<MI>
Some algorithms to score co-occurrency.

    • score

      public abstract double score(double Oab, double Oa, double Ob, double N)
      Score of the co-occurrency.
      Parameters:
      Oab - observed co-occurrences of ab.
      Oa - observed occurences of a (with ab)
      Ob - observed occurences of b (with ab)
      N - total occurrences, with a and b.
      Returns:
      a score according to a formula.

    • expected

      protected double[] expected(double Oab, double Oa, double Ob, double N)
      Used by CHI2 or G, calculate the four expected {Eab, Ea!b, Eb!a, E!a!b}.
      • Eab = Oa * Ob / N
      • Ea!b = Oa * (N - Ob) / N
      • Eb!a = Ob * (N - Oa) / N
      • E!a!b = (N - Oa) * (N - Ob) / N
      Σ Ei = ((OaOb) + (OaN - OaOb) + (ObN - OaOb) + (N² -OaN -ObN +OaOb)) / N = N² / N = N
      Parameters:
      Oab - observed co-occurrences of ab.
      Oa - observed occurences of a (with ab)
      Ob - observed occurences of b (with ab)
      N - total occurrences, with a and b.
      Returns:
      {Eab, Ea!b, Eb!a, E!a!b}

    • observed

      protected double[] observed(double Oab, double Oa, double Ob, double N)
      Returns the four observed {Oab, Oa!b, Ob!a, O!a!b}.
      • Oab = Oab
      • Oa!b = Oa - Oab
      • Ob!a = Ob - Oab
      • O!a!b = N - Oa - Ob + Oab
      Σ Oi = (Oab) + (Oa -Oab) + (Ob -Oab) + (N -Oa -Ob +Oab) = N
      Parameters:
      Oab - observed co-occurrences of ab, not used.
      Oa - observed occurences of a (with ab)
      Ob - observed occurences of b (with ab)
      N - total occurrences, with a and b.
      Returns:
      {Oab, Oa!b, Ob!a, O!a!b}
